text: Baaxok exxaaxiy ittak garit taniy meqeeh sinam tanfiqem elle taabukee kee xagadah tan baaxoy tu elle Aabuke waytah tan, qinab basaatin (masnoona kinnuk) kee buqreey (darqi kinnuk) tamiir√°y inki laqibik namma caxaay sidiica caxa kak taabuke tanih, inki leek afaquk inki burtal aabakuk, kinnih immay makmol tuuy tuk kak muxxusna tan, diggah tohul kaskassoowaah cubbusa marah Yallih dudda tascasse astooti edde tan
